overview:
Michael Charest is the CEO and co-founder of Rewardix. Michael is an investor in several technology companies.

Michael has over 20 years of sales leadership and management experience within the software industry. He has served as Vice President of Sales for various enterprise software and Saas companies, most notably as Group Vice President with Exstream Software, which went from startup in 2000 to nearly $100M in revenue before being acquired by HP for close to $1B in 2007. He holds a B.S. degree in Systems Science from the University of West Florida and a MBA from the University of North Florida.
